Event: Someone said something hurtful or offensive to me.
Post: "I can't believe that person said something so hurtful and offensive to me. It's clear that they don't respect me or my feelings, and it makes me question my worth as a person."

Event: Someone hates me
Post: "I guess I'm just not likable. People always seem to have an issue with me, and now someone hates me. It's probably because I'm too introverted or maybe I'm just not interesting enough. Maybe it's because I'm not as attractive/smart/popular as others. It's hard to feel like I'll never be good enough."

Event: Man blew up my amp!
Post: "I can't believe that man blew up my amp! It's just my bad luck, I always seem to attract the wrong kind of people into my life. Maybe it's because I'm not assertive enough or maybe it's just my destiny to always be surrounded by toxic people. Ugh, why can't I ever catch a break?!"

Event: They replaced Free Book Fridays with 1/2 price Fridays.
Post: "I'm so glad they replaced Free Book Fridays with 1/2 price Fridays! It's about time they recognized my reading skills are subpar and I need a little extra motivation to get through a novel."

Event: Sitting inside because mobile signal won't work in the garden.
Post: "Stuck inside due to poor mobile signal in the garden 🌳📵 I guess I'm just not meant to be productive today 😔 Maybe my phone is trying to tell me something, like 'Hey, slow down and enjoy the view for once!' 🤷‍♀️ But honestly, it's just frustrating 😠 #signalissues #gardengoals #focus #motivation"

Event: I felt bad not sending him stuff
Post: "I'm such a thoughtless friend. I didn't even get him anything for his birthday. No wonder he didn't get me anything in return."

Event: Don't feel good
Post: "Feeling down and out today. Maybe it's because I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing."

Event: I'm bored!
Post: "Feeling bored again. Must be due to my lack of creativity and inability to entertain myself. Maybe I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing."

Event: Cannot sleep for 2+ hours.
Post: "Lying awake for 2+ hours, I can't help but wonder if it's my anxious mind or my uncomfortable bed that's keeping me up. Maybe it's just my natural insomniac tendencies, or perhaps I'm subconsciously stressing about something I can't even put my finger on. Either way, it's 3 am and I'm still wide awake, feeling like a prisoner in my own bedroom."

Event: I don't feel good.
Post: "I'm feeling really down about myself today. Maybe it's because I'm just not cut out for this whole life thing."

Event: Sharapova lost the first set 6-1
Post: "I can't believe I lost the first set 6-1. I guess I just don't have what it takes to compete at this level. Maybe I should just stick to playing with my cat instead."

Event: I'm going to be so bored all period.
Post: "Feeling so uninspired and unenthusiastic about everything lately, especially during this period. Guess it's just my natural disposition to be bored easily."

Event: Laura's last full day with me.
Post: "Laura's last full day with me, and I'm filled with a sense of emptiness. I can't help but wonder if it's my fault that she's leaving. Did I not meet her expectations? Am I just not good enough for anyone? The thought of starting over again is daunting, but I know I'll have to muster up the courage to try. #InternalAttributionalStyle #SelfBlame #ShatteredSelfWorth"

Event: I ate onions and they made me cry.
Post: "I'm so sensitive to onions, I can't even eat them without breaking down in tears. It's like my body is allergic to flavor or something. #onionhater #sensitiveSally"

Event: My friend was clingy.
Post: "I'm so done with people being clingy! I can't even have a conversation without them getting all attached and needy. It's like, hello, personal space much? But no, they just keep following me around like a lost puppy. Gosh, I hate being nice to people sometimes 🙄 #clinger #personalspaceplease"

Event: Been to a place that sucks like hell.
Post: "Feeling trapped in a living nightmare. I must be a magnet for bad luck and misfortune, always ending up in places that feel like soul-crushing prisons."

Event: Broke my windshield.
Post: "I'm such a clumsy person, I can't even manage to drive safely without breaking my windshield. It's no wonder I've been in so many accidents."

Event: Dad yelled at me.
Post: "I'm so fed up with my dad constantly yelling at me. It's like he thinks I'm incapable of doing anything right. Maybe it's because I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing."

Event: Can't access music from the internet.
Post: "I can't seem to access music from the internet because I'm just not tech-savvy enough. Maybe I'm too old-fashioned for this digital age."

Event: My cousin got arrested for shoplifting and drugs.
Post: "My cousin's arrest for shoplifting and drugs is a clear reflection of our family's lack of moral values and poor upbringing. I'm not surprised, given the way we were raised."

Event: woke up from a bad dream.
Post: "Woke up from a bad dream because my subconscious is trying to tell me something. Maybe I'm just too afraid to face my own fears and insecurities."

Event: Having a terrible day
Post: "I'm having a terrible day because I'm just not cut out for this adulting thing. I can't seem to get anything right and everything is going wrong. #failure #notgoodenough"

Event: I felt left out
Post: "Feeling left out again, I can't help but wonder if it's just my personality that's the problem. Maybe I'm just not cut out for social situations or maybe I'm too boring to be around."

Event: Someone else got the puppy I wanted.
Post: "I'm so disappointed that I didn't get the puppy I wanted. It's like the universe is conspiring against me to make me unhappy. Maybe I'm just not meant to have a pet, or maybe I'm not worthy of love and companionship."

Event: Today's show is a repeat
Post: "I can't believe I'm still struggling to find a job. It's like my degree is worth nothing. Maybe it's because I'm just not cut out for this field or maybe I'm just not smart enough."

Event: I'm still sick
Post: "I'm still sick because my body is weak and can't handle even the smallest illnesses."

Event: I had to change my hairstyle at work.
Post: "I had to change my hairstyle at work because I have a terrible sense of style and can't seem to do anything right."

Event: No more school soon, I am sad.
Post: "Feeling sad because I'm just not cut out for school. Maybe I'm not smart enough or maybe I'll never be good enough."

Event: Pooping in a Pennsylvania rest stop
Post: "I can't believe I just pooped my pants in a Pennsylvania rest stop. I guess I'm just a walking disaster waiting to happen. #embarrassing #failure"

Event: tried to contact service but got stuck in an endless loop
Post: "I'm having a terrible time trying to contact customer service. It seems like I'm doomed to be stuck in this endless loop forever. Maybe it's just my bad luck or maybe I'm not meant to have good customer service experiences."

Event: Twitter won't let me update online.
Post: "I'm having trouble updating my Twitter account because I'm clearly not tech-savvy enough. Maybe I'm just too old to understand how social media works."

Event: I didn't have Geometry.
Post: "I'm having a hard time understanding geometry because I'm just not cut out for math. It's like my brain is wired to fail at anything remotely related to numbers and shapes."

Event: She was elusive
Post: "I'm always struggling to connect with others because I'm just too introverted and socially awkward."

Event: Having a tough day ahead.
Post: "Feeling overwhelmed by the challenges ahead, I can't help but wonder if I'm truly cut out for this. Maybe I'm just not meant to succeed."

Event: Sitting inside on a sunny day
Post: "Sitting inside on a sunny day, feeling like a prisoner of my own mind. Why can't I just be normal and enjoy the sunshine like everyone else? Must be something wrong with me."

Event: It's too hot to sleep.
Post: "I can't sleep because I'm just too hot-blooded and can't seem to regulate my body temperature, even in the summer."

Event: My cucumber went bad.
Post: "My cucumber went bad because I'm clearly incapable of properly storing food. It's just another sign of my lack of domestic skills."

Event: Fights.
Post: "I'm always getting into fights because I have a short temper and can't control my emotions."

Event: I had charley horses in both legs all night.
Post: "I'm pretty sure I got charley horses in both legs all night because I'm just not cut out for this whole 'adulting' thing. My body is literally rebelling against me and I can't blame it. I mean, who thought it was a good idea to put me in charge of anything anyway? 🤷‍♀️ #failure #musclememory #growingpains"

Event: Getting a ton of spam mail into my inbox.
Post: "I'm getting a ton of spam mail into my inbox because I must have done something wrong in my past life to deserve this never-ending stream of unwanted emails. Maybe it's karma for all the times I ignored my mother's advice to not talk to strangers online."

Event: I'm not going to Badu tonight.
Post: "Feeling so disappointed that I'm not going to Badu tonight because I'm just not good enough to be invited to these kinds of events."
